Install

How to use

Example starting with synthetic dataset generation.

{% raw %} 
dna_dict = gen_dna_vocab(kmer=1)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
synthetic_data = generate_Seqs_Exp_Dataset(50,10,30)
